channel.title: Comments on: The New Public Relations

item.title: by: Michael Schubart
item.description:
Hi Ryan,

Seems like it was a problem in my aggregator. I'm now using the RSS 2.0 and it works perfectly.

Thanks a lot, Michael
item.content:encoded:
Hi Ryan,

Seems like it was a problem in my aggregator. I’m now using the RSS 2.0 and it works perfectly.

Thanks a lot,
Michael

item.title: by: Ryan Tomayko
item.description: Okay. The Atom and RSS2 for main posts are validating and the comments feed also checks out. Thanks, Sam.
item.content:encoded: Okay. The Atom and RSS2 for main posts are validating and the comments feed also checks out. Thanks, Sam.

item.title: by: Ryan Tomayko
item.description: Yep. Let me dig that up. I've been meaning to run everything through the validator... Nows as good a time as any, I suppose.
item.content:encoded: Yep. Let me dig that up. I’ve been meaning to run everything through the validator… Nows as good a time as any, I suppose.

item.title: by: Sam Ruby
item.description:
Can you change your atom:summary to text/html?

http://feedvalidator.org/check.cgi?url=http%3A%2F%2Flesscode.org%2Ffeed%2Fatom%2F
item.content:encoded:
Can you change your atom:summary to text/html?

http://feedvalidator.org/check.cgi?url=http%3A%2F%2Flesscode.org%2Ffeed%2Fatom%2F

item.title: by: Ryan Tomayko
item.description:
It should be now -- I'm definitely a full-content type-a' guy :) Can you take a quick peek and see what feed you're pulling from? Both of the following are full content feeds:

  • http://lesscode.org/feed/ (RSS2)
  • http://lesscode.org/feed/atom/ (Atom)

Is it possible that your aggregrator is configured for summaries only?
item.content:encoded:
It should be now — I’m definitely a full-content type-a’ guy :) Can you take a quick peek and see what feed you’re pulling from? Both of the following are full content feeds:

  • http://lesscode.org/feed/ (RSS2)
  • http://lesscode.org/feed/atom/ (Atom)

Is it possible that your aggregrator is configured for summaries only?

item.title: by: Michael Schubart
item.description:
Hi,

Could you please change the RSS feed for this site so that it includes the full posts, rather than excerpts?

Thanks, Michael
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

Could you please change the RSS feed for this site so that it includes the full posts, rather than excerpts?

Thanks, Michael
